field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓exists (select 1 from dmdvcsks b where year(b.ngay_ks) >= @@table.nam and @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs)⩓not exists(select 1 from dtkhct b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_so = b.ma_so and b.nam = @@table.nam) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from dtkhct b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_so = b.ma_so and b.nam = @@table.nam) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: nam
field.check: exists (select 1 from dmstt b where year(b.ngay_ks) >= @@table.nam)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: not exists (select 1 from dmvv b where @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv)

field.name: ma_so
field.check: not exists (select 1 from dtdmct b where @@table.ma_so = b.ma_so)
